## Primary Outcomes * 4 Active Collections * NC State University Websites * James B. Hunt Impact Collection * Landscape Architecture * Architecture and Design * ~ 400 Active Seeds * 718 GB of Data * Full Process Documentation
## Secondary Outcomes * Active Members in Web Archiving Community * Open QA Automation Process * Open Documentation
## What's Next? * Expanded Collections * New Collections * Web Archive Portal
